## is.formattable 
is.formattable Test for objects of ’formattable’ class

#### Description
Test for objects of ’formattable’ class

#### Usage
is.formattable(x)

#### Arguments
x an object

#### Value
TRUE if x has class ’formattable’; FALSE otherwise.

#### Examples
is.formattable(10)
is.formattable(formattable(10))
